div.div: 416 WATERFIELD NORTH CLINTON, KY 42031 P 270.653.2341 F 270.653.6007

img.style: width: 41px; vertical-align: middle; padding: 10px; border-left: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12); border-right: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12);

div.style: width: 740px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; padding-left: 15px;

p.span: Please read carefully for updated meal deliveries and times! Hickman County Schools are continuing to provide breakfast and lunch free of charge for persons 18 years old and younger. Note that due to continuous changes in government & health recommendations we are changing our dates of service after spring break. Note you will get multiple days’ worth of meals at pick up. If you need more information please contact Megan Adams FSD at (270)-653-2039 for questions. https://www.usda.gov/non-discrimination-statement
Where: Cafeteria Doors facing the Board of Education
